name: Dodge Bowls
description:
I created this game originally as a practice game, a small indie type.

This project has transformed from a practice project to a financial aid, I'm in need of some support to keep me and my family going, I hope people can help me out by donating. I set this game as "Pay what you want" in hopes people can still enjoy this game without paying for it, however donations are greatly and absolutly appreciated and will be used to help us financially and so I can persue my dreams of game developing.

This is just a small little dodging game where you dodge enemy's while you try to rack up your time.
